posts.content:
please do not read this add if you got to ask the wife if you can buy
I have had tons of time wasters
No welding needed a super great bus I must be mad
For sale 1961 VW split screen sundial or ez bus imported from the USA
By myself back in 2011
This bus has had the following welding done with new schofield panels
Inner and outer lower front valance,both bottom half of the cargo doors
Cargo floor sections both sides ,both rockers,drivers side cab step was replaced
The whole underside was painted in blue zinc rust proof paint
Narrow front beam and straight axle rear running gear
Steering box guard fitted as bus is slammed but nice to drive
1600cc engine
Wheels are rare ap wheels which have also been painted silver
A lot of the dove blue paint is original
The complete interior was redone to match the sundial or ez interior
New front and rear seats belts have been fitted
Nearly new mot and tax free
The bus needs a few things doing
Please call me on 07928533918 or email at jamie.chapman@hotmail.com
For more information
This is one cool very solid bus with all pop out windows and nearly full length roof rack and ladder
This bus just sits in my garage getting very little use
If you hate people talking to you about this bus,then it's not for you
People love it
Asking Â£22.000 Ono
Know looking at other split bus prices this bus is too cheap
Please please please please please no timewasters or photo hunters
As I will not answer
Thanks
Cool bus but your pics are upside down it won't help the sale

Please please please please no more emails just asking for photos
Just serious enquirers only
Thank you

sorry to keep asking please no more timewasters or photograph hunters
thanks

Hi Jamie
Cool bus I passed it in the layby near wimbourne.
Do you know anyone good with paint as I need a small job in the front of my split. ?
Hope you sell it I know I wouldn't if I owned it.

Sent from my SM-G361F using Tapatalk

Hi Phil
My mate does bodywork over west moors way
He is really good
Please call me for his number
07928533918
Thank you
